staffthoughts.EntertainerGotoEntertainGuests: It's time to do a show!
staffthoughts.EntertainerEntertainGuests: I hope the crowd likes my show!
staffthoughts.EntertainerGotoEntertainGuest: Oh no, %s looks bored. I better entertain them.
staffthoughts.EntertainerEntertainGuest: I'm glad that %s likes my antics!
staffthoughts.EntertainerSplashFountain: Good thing there's a splash fountain here, this suit gets hot!
staffthoughts.MaintenanceWorkerGetPlantFoliage: That spot could use foliage from %s.
staffthoughts.MaintenanceWorkerGoPlantTree: I'm going to plant a tree at %s.
staffthoughts.EducatorGotoEducateGuestsFossils: I can't wait to teach guests about fossils!
staffthoughts.EducatorEducateGuestsFossils: Ooh! Don't forget to tell them to dig for bones in the Play Dig Pit!
staffthoughts.PaleontologistSearchFossil: Hey, I think there is something nearby ...
staffthoughts.PaleontologistMarkFossil: Mark this spot to secure the site!
staffthoughts.PaleontologistGotoDigFossil: Enough scanning ... time to get digging!
staffthoughts.PaleontologistDigFossil: I love digging in the dirt! Finding fossils is the best part of my job!
staffthoughts.DRTCrateTagDino: There's our target! %s is over there!
staffthoughts.DRTCrateCallDinoDistraction: %s needs to be distracted to tranquilize it.
staffthoughts.DRTCrateCallRobotReplacement: Oh, no! Our distraction robot is gone! Better call in a replacement.
staffthoughts.DinoRecoveryCrateTeamGoCrateAnimal: It's my turn to crate the animal.
staffthoughts.DinoRecoveryCrateTeamCrateAnimal: The dinosaur is crated. Are any others rampaging?
staffthoughts.DRTTranqFollow: Better keep up -- don't want to get left behind!
staffthoughts.DinoRecoveryTranqTeamGoTranqAnimal: I am sooo not paid enough for this!
